overview: Vital, the cynical and lonely postman of a small village, can’t stop himself from reading the postcards that the parishioners send to God. After reading the disturbing missive from Dorothée D’Amour, his old school teacher, Vital is bitterly punished for his indiscretion. Unable to ignore the postcard, he has no other choice than to substitute himself to God.
title: DEAR GOD
